name: Taxing Titans
title: Highest Tax Revenue from Income and Profits
description: In 2022, Australia collected 67.86% of its revenue from taxes on income, profits, and capital gains, showcasing its robust tax system.

name: Mineral Wealth Drain
title: Significant Mineral Depletion Costs
description: In 2021, Australia faced a mineral depletion cost of approximately $68.6 billion, reflecting the high extraction of its natural resources.

name: Regulatory Excellence
title: Top Regulatory Quality
description: Australia achieved a perfect score in regulatory quality in 2023, placing it at the pinnacle of global governance standards.

name: Preschool Pioneers
title: Leading Preprimary School Enrollment
description: In 2020, Australia boasted a gross preprimary school enrollment rate of 160.21%, with male enrollment at 163.34% and female at 156.92%.

name: Childhood Weight Woes
title: High Prevalence of Overweight Children
description: By 2024, 26.4% of Australian children under 5 were overweight, up from 22% in 2017, indicating a growing health concern.

name: Peaceful Land
title: Minimal Battle-related Deaths
description: In 2018, Australia reported just one battle-related death, highlighting its peaceful domestic environment.
